name: Week 1, Vera Molnar 01
description: This recreated artwork is originally from Vera Moln치r. I have basically not changed anything from the original look. I started with testing around with it, figuring out what is what. I made my own version of Vers Moln치rs art, with random color choice.

name: Week 1, Vera Molnar 02
description: This recreated artwork is originally from Vera Moln치r. What i've done to change it is to use both random color and perlin noise. This makes the color interact with eachother and it looks like the colors are fading into eachother.

name: Week 1, Vera Molnar 03
description: This recreated artwork is originally from Vera Moln치r. What i've done to change it is to add ellipses into the mix and also letting it be a loop. It makes it really tough to look at for a long time.

name: Week 1, Hypnotic Squares 01
description: Tried playing some with William Kolomyjec's art piece Hypnotic Squares by adding some color.

name: Week 1, Hypnotic Squares 02
description: On this one I added some movement and perlin noise for the color of the stroke.

name: Week 2, Tyler Hobbs 01
description: Tried making something that looked like Tyler Hobbs 'Return Zero' and when playing with the values this came up instead and I like the interactiveness of the art piece.

name: Week 2, Tyler Hobbs 02
description: This is also a interactive art piece, more inspired by my last one than Tyler Hobbs. It looks like its raining with the click of a button.
